Source.Name: dua-cli
Source.Summary: A tool to conveniently learn about the disk usage of directories
Source.Description: dua (Disk Usage Analyzer) is a tool to conveniently learn about the disk usage of directories, fast! It offers a terminal user interface for interactive exploration and supports parallel directory traversal for improved performance.

Package.Name: dua-cli
Package.Summary: A tool to conveniently learn about the disk usage of directories
Package.Description: dua (Disk Usage Analyzer) is a tool to conveniently learn about the disk usage of directories, fast! It offers a terminal user interface for interactive exploration and supports parallel directory traversal for improved performance.
